ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I will allow them more time. My subterfuge is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet I will give them respite: Surely My plan is compact.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I am giving them a respite. Great is My scheme!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I shall give them respite, however, My plan is so strong that they will never be able to escape from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And I will give them respite; indeed My plan is very solid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I will grant them a respite. Verily, My plan is strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I do bear with them, surely My plan is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and I shall respite them -- assuredly My guile is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet I bear with them, for lo! My scheme is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I shall grant them some respite, for My plan is powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I bear with them; verily My contrivance is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I will grant them respite, for My devising is indeed sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A (long) respite will I grant them: truly powerful is My Plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I will grant them a respite. Verily, My Plan is strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I shall respite them, My stratagem is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I will give them respite. My plan is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:45] And I will grant them respite; [for] assuredly My devising is firm, [My devising is] severe and cannot be withstood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet I bear with them) I give them a reprieve, (for lo! My scheme is firm) My punishment is severe.
